pageSetting.title: 贷款业绩分配监控

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select /*+ append parallel(zh,8) */ zh.jgdh,max(jg.jgmc) as jgmc,$qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,$zhye$ as zhye, sum(case when zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 1 else 0 end) as mfp, sum(case when zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end) as yfp from jxdx_dkzh zh left join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=zh.jgdh inner join xtb_jggxst st on st.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and st.sjjgkhdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and $jsrq$ between st.qsrq and st.jsrq where zh.ffrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and zh.zhye>$zhye$ group by zh.jgdh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select /*+ append parallel(zh,8) */ zh.jgdh,max(jg.jgmc) as jgmc,$qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq,$zhye$ as zhye, sum(case when zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 1 else 0 end) as mfp, sum(case when zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' then 0 else 1 end) as yfp from jxdx_dkzh zh left join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=zh.jgdh inner join xtb_jggxst st on st.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and st.sjjgkhdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and $jsrq$ between st.qsrq and st.jsrq where zh.ffrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and zh.zhye>$zhye$ group by zh.jgdh ) t
